text: Ani tyahuna motha atyacari anakhi kona asu sakato, jo allahavara khota aropa thevila kinva ase mhanela ki majhyakade vahayi ali ahe, vastavika tyacyakade kahica ale nahi ani jo ase mhanala ki, jyaprakare allahane utaravile tase midekhila utaravina. Jara tumhi atyacarinna mrtyucya kathora siksa-yataneta pahala, jevha phariste apale hata pudhe karuna mhanatila, apala jiva kadha. Aja tumhala allahavara nahaka aropa thevanyamule ani ghamendine tyacya ayatinca inkara karanyapayi apamanadayaka mobadala dila ja'ila
